text: Tha Carter is the fourth studio album by American rapper Lil Wayne. It was released on June 29, 2004. == Track listing == == Charts == ===Weekly charts=== Chart (2004) Peak position US Billboard 200 5 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) 2 US Top Rap Albums (Billboard) 2 === Year-end charts === Chart (2004) Position US Billboard 200 116 US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) 22 US Top Rap Albums (Billboard) 13 Chart (2005) Position US Top R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums (Billboard) 71 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Lil Wayne albums Category:Cash Money Records albums
title: Tha Carter
